reviewText: Happy with the product, the quality is great and enjoyed it
$156 for a boring movie that you can buy for less than $15 and 5 short episodes of the anime that you can find for free online! Not worth it!

This movie is beautifully animated, and just so good. Typical Square Enix, and a must for any Final Fantasy fans.

This box does include the english dub for Kingsglaive. The box is beautiful and the art book is really cool to have.

There really isn't much else to say. It's a great film.
